= Latest pre-compiled binaries =

Here are the latest binaries you may download for flashing your '9X, without needing to recompile from source.

There are a lot of options, you choose the one which fits you the best!

=== Unmodified '9X Radio Version ===

 * *[http://open9x.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/open9x-stock.hex open9x-stock.hex]* -- For stock hardware with no internal re-wiring.

 * *[http://open9x.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/open9x-stock-heli-templates.hex open9x-stock-heli-templates.hex]* -- The same with heli and templates menus.

 * *[http://open9x.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/open9x-stock-heli-templates-speaker.hex open9x-stock-heli-templates-speaker.hex]* -- The same, with speaker mods for softer sounding tones.

=== '9X Radio Versions with Fr-sky telemetry modification ===

 * *[http://open9x.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/open9x-stock-frsky.hex open9x-stock-frsky.hex]* -- Fr-Sky telemetry mod.
